pages.text: The $(mob)Hippocampus$() is an animal found in $(thing)Oceans$(). While it is sluggish on land, it can swim at very high speed underwater. It can be tamed by feeding it $(l:minecraft_elder_guardian)$(mob)Sponges$(), and can then be provided with a $(item)Saddle$() to use it as a mount, given armor or a $(item)Chest$() to allow it to transport items. Riding a $(mob)Hippocampus$() allows the rider to breath underwater. It can also be bred with $(l:minecraft_guardian)$(item)Prismarine Crystals$() once tamed.
$(mob)Hippocampi$() drop $(item)Shiny Scales$() on death. They can be brewed into $(item)Potions of Water Breathing$().
